May 12, 2025: Back in Amsterdam, Take 2! Sure didn’t sit at home for long, as it was soon after over to Thailand to attend AISTATS. Awesome location, and conference was well-sized (read, not too large) to engage with various researchers. Fun to see the ABI team again, and talk to some interesting people such as Daniel Roy and Aapo Hyvärinen. Bonus for the inspiring talk on martingale posteriors by Chris Holmes. I didn’t know this but apparently post-Bayes is a thing.
